name: pnp-list-environments-flows-apps
title: List all Power Platform Environments and their Flows and Apps
shortDescription: This script will retrieve all environments as an Administrator and loop through all Flows and Apps to provide you with a report indicating how much Power Platform components are in use in the tenant.
longDescription: This script will retrieve all environments as an Administrator and loop through all Flows and Apps to provide you with a report indicating how much Power Platform components are in use in the tenant.
